{
  "data" => {
      "id" => "#{user.id}",
      "type" => "users",
      "attributes" => {
        "languages" => [
          {
            "name" => "#{user.languages[0].name}",
            "learn" => false,
            "native" => true
          }
        ],
        "location" => {
          "locale" => "#{user.location.locale}"
        },
        "name" => "#{user.name}",
        "email" => "#{user.email}",
        "age" => user.age,
        "gender" => "#{user.gender}"
      }
    }
}
